summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 21, D.T. Denny's North Seattle Addition; being the alley from West Harrison Street to West Thomas Street, between Queen Anne Avenue and 1st Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 106728 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
